title: (x) italic "passion for climbing" script - Flash {Mike F, Rainer}
content:
Hi,

I’m producing an add for an Italic brand. I only have their logo in low rez and have no idea what the font is. Does anyone recognize this font?

author: peter_monrad

comments.content:
[Linotype Flash](http://web.archive.org/web/20070329121401/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/flash/)  
_Arrgh, late. Hello Mike, didn’t refresh, nice to meet you here …_
